TRIGGER WARNING

Dear reader , [Your]81-you safety and well - being are important to [me]0-i . Please be aware before embarking on this story that there are themes and first - person experiences that may be triggering to [some readers]82-some readers . This book deals with topics of depression , anxiety , and attempted suicide . [I]0-i promise [you]81-you there is a happy ending involving [a body confident cam girl]83-a body confident cam girl and [a very vulgar voyeur with bad jokes and a filthy mouth]84-a very vulgar voyeur with bad jokes and a filthy mouth .

PART TWO
